tagRef.name: Fog Bitmap
tagRef.tooltip: Noise texture to use on the screen-aligned sheets of fog

float32.name: Texture Repeat Rate
float32.tooltip: Scaling factor to apply to fog UV coordinates

float32.name: Distance Between Sheets
float32.tooltip: Separating distance between sheets of fog

float32.name: Depth Fade Factor
float32.tooltip: Lower values (approaching 0) cause a smoother fade at scene boundaries. Larger values (1 or more) make for a sharp transition

float32.name: Transparent Sort Distance
float32.tooltip: Distance from the camera where we sort the patchy fog effect (default: 100)

dataref.name: Wind Strength Across Distance Function
dataref.tooltip: Multiplies the wind strength based upon distance from player
